text: Tamen jiangyao yitong chulai jian an la, er nuoruo zhe jiang dui zi da de renmen shuo:“Women yuanlai shi nimen de bu xia, nimen neng ti women duikang an la de yidian er xingfa ma?” Tamen jiang shuo:“Jiaruo an la yindao women, women ye biran yindao nimen. Women wulun jizao huo rennai, zhe zai women shi yiyang de, women jue wu binan suo.”
